Example: Using beta to estimate a required return
Acme, Inc., has a capital structure that is 40% debt and 60% equity. The expected
return on the market is 12%, and the risk-free rate is 4%. What discount rate should
an analyst use to calculate the NPV of a project with an equity beta of 0.9 if the firm's
after-tax cost of debt is 5%?
